Definition: Important Measures that can later be utilized in the development of Key Performance Indicators (KPIs).
Any type of good (shirt, shoes, pants, survival gear, etc.) that is sold at one of the two thousand GOAC store locations.
Any person or corporate organization that makes a purchase from a GOAC retail store location.
A dimension that is utilized to monitor store and overall company efficiency.
A retail facility where products are housed and displayed so customers may use their money to purchase said products.
